title: Why Should I Continue to Play?
body: The gameplay is addictive, the community can be helpful, and the lore is pretty cool. Riot keeps releasing skins, champions, and new features, and sure, the game is pretty, is fun, and they're starting to branch out and create more games. But I don't think Riot is branching out anymore. There is a new issue seemingly every patch because they're leaving League to die and thinking we won't notice.
